item.title: Notes on CSS
item.description: Flexbox Flexbox cheat sheet justify-content means alignment in the main axis. align-items means alignment in the cross axis. BEM Naming Convention BEM cheat sheet RSCSS vs. BEM Grids Grids can overlap if it is explicitly set. z-index can also work on grid cells, changing the overlap order. the grid cell can be set to other display patterns, such as: display: flex and can be used to center the text vertically: Look at this StackOverflow Question the grid cell can be a grid container too by declaring display:grid.
